name: Vantec Europe
description: Vantec Europe Limited (VEU), part of the Logisteed Group, is a globally recognised logistics provider specialising in innovative last mile solutions, with 13 UK sites, serving various industries and underscored by a commitment to carbon neutrality by 2050; we're currently seeking a full-time IT Developer to focus on Java Development for our custom warehousing and indirect systems, offering a salary of up to £38,500.00 per year and benefits including pension, work from home, and more.
